body:
{"success": true, "data": {"poem": "In the ethereal light of dawn,
Where forest whisper with grace unknown,
Through meadows where the wild winds whisper,
And ethereal dreams are gently sown.

The forest speaks in whispered tones,
Of ethereal tales from times before,
While shadows whisper through ancient stones,
And secrets wait by every shore.

O ethereal forest, forever whisper,
In realms where mortal eyes can't see,
Your essence shall forever whisper,
In ethereal eternity.", "analysis": {"themeAnalysis": {"emotional_tone": {"primary": "contemplative", "secondary": null, "intensity": "medium", "scores": {"contemplative": 0}}, "themes": ["contemplative reflection"], "literary_devices": [{"line": 1, "text": "ethereal light", "type": "visual"}, {"line": 3, "text": "forest speaks", "type": "conceptual"}], "word_analysis": {"original": {"verb": "whisper", "adjective": "ethereal", "noun": "forest"}, "enhanced": {"verb": "whisper", "adjective": "ethereal", "noun": "forest"}, "transformation_quality": "moderate"}}, "visualRecommendations": {"colors": {"primary": "#6b7280", "secondary": "#9ca3af", "accent": "#d1d5db", "background": "#f3f4f6", "gradient": ["#6b7280", "#9ca3af"]}, "typography": {"fontFamily": "serif", "fontWeight": "500", "letterSpacing": "normal", "lineHeight": 1.8, "fontSize": "medium"}, "animations": {"duration": 2500, "easing": "ease-in-out", "stagger": 200, "style": "calm"}, "layout": {"style": "centered", "alignment": "left", "spacing": "normal"}, "effects": {"blur": false, "glow": false, "shadow": false, "gradient": false}}, "poetryMetrics": {"readabilityScore": 0.85, "emotionalImpact": 0.5, "creativityIndex": 0.75, "coherenceScore": 0.9}}, "theme": {"colors": {"primary": "#6b7280", "secondary": "#9ca3af", "accent": "#d1d5db", "background": "#f3f4f6", "gradient": ["#6b7280", "#9ca3af"]}, "animations": {"style": "calm", "duration": 2500, "stagger": 200}, "typography": {"mood": "classic", "scale": 1.0}}, "metadata": {"id": "poem-1759064327-4ba4faf7", "wordCount": 69, "sentiment": "contemplative", "emotion": "contemplative", "generationTime": 1.5}}, "cached": false, "timestamp": "2025-09-28T12:58:47.431833"}
